attributes.action: call a general election to decide whether the british people have confidence in the current goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is sad to hear constantly about failures of government whether it is personal data going missing or not offering a referendum on europe as promised. Isn't it about time that we had a say as a democracy after all Gordon Brown is not an elected Prime Minister - let the people decide

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
